TMR_AntennaMap Struct Reference

#include <tmr_serial_reader.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint8_t antenna
uint8_t txPort
uint8_t rxPort

Detailed Description

Mapping between an arbitrary "antenna" number and a TX/RX port pair. Not all TX/RX pairings are valid for a device.

Member Data Documentation

uint8_t TMR_AntennaMap::antenna

The antenna number - an arbitrary value.

uint8_t TMR_AntennaMap::rxPort

The device antenna port to use for reception.

uint8_t TMR_AntennaMap::txPort

The device antenna port to use for transmission.
